Based on the given preferences, I would recommend "The Patriot" (2000) to the user.

"The Patriot" is an American historical drama film directed by Paul Warganis and written by David T. Grimes. The film stars Mel Gibson as Benjamin Martin, Francis Ford Coppola as General Andrew Jackson, William Graham as General William Hardee, and Patrick Tatopoulos as Lord John Milton. 

The film tells the story of Benjamin Martin, a wealthy landowner in New Jersey during the American Revolutionary War (1775-83). When his son is killed by British soldiers, he becomes convinced that the British government has intentionally murdered his family. He decides to join the Continental Army and fight against the British government, as he believes that he can use his military expertise to help defeat the British government.
